column1: .@nvdems are creating the most accessible & inclusive caucus in the nation. Its success will be in thanks to the dedicated vols that are playing a key role like the ones attending today’s summit at Centennial HS in Las Vegas today! Join us to volunteer —> https://t.co/H0Ou1zWd6b https://t.co/TQxQwW45pN

Make no mistake: Last night’s victories in KY and VA were a referendum on Trump’s reckless agenda. When Democrats come together organize and fight for the things we care about like health care - we win. The momentum is on our side but we cannot let up. We must keep fighting.

El Paso & Dayton - two more communities left devastated by senseless acts of gun violence. As Members of Congress it’s our responsibility to ACT to help prevent these tragedies. But the truth is nothing will change until we elect a Senate that’s not afraid to do the right thing

As the dem presidential candidates head to the debate stage I want to be clear about NV’s Latinx voters: Don’t take them for granted. You have to earn their vote. This will be key to any candidate’s success in our caucus and across the country. #DemDebate https://t.co/7ltDl5fQ2A

Deeply saddened to learn of Nancy’s passing one Nevada Democrats’ most dedicated volunteers. Nancy was always one of the first to ask “how can I help?” She worked hard to get NV Dems elected and my race in 2016 was no different. My thoughts are with Nancy’s family and friends. https://t.co/h31ZrAn1Y2

Thrilled to support Nevada’s very own Assemblywoman @sandra4nv to be @emilyslist’s next Gabrielle Gifford’s Rising Star recipient! But we need your help to get it done. Make sure to cast your vote before Friday 2/15 at 5pm ET! Sandra is a fighter for NV’s women & families. https://t.co/Uvt9MSHEkb

Thrilled to have my good friend @Maggie_Hassan’s incredible leadership working to help the @dscc take back the Senate Majority in 2020 and #electmorewomen to the Senate! It will be because of the help of the #WSN’s grassroots team that we will get it done. https://t.co/LOFreODInE

I believe our elected officials should reflect the diversity of those we represent. I'm proud to endorse @MontoyaforMayor in Dallas. As the Chair of the Mayor's Task Force on Poverty Regina has proven she can take on the big issues facing Dallas. Join me: https://t.co/ZU5gj0EI6K https://t.co/8ZLf0Ucjwd
